remarks: Value of the composition of two functors.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofuval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cofuval.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func D ) ) $.
cofuval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Func E ) ) $.
cofuval $p |- ( ph -> ( G o.func F ) = <. ( ( 1st ` G ) o. ( 1st ` F ) ) , ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( ( ( 1st ` F ) ` x ) ( 2nd ` G ) ( ( 1st ` F ) ` y ) ) o. ( x ( 2nd ` F ) y ) ) ) >. ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
